author: Celia Brooks
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7.  In a bowl, mix together the artichokes, mayonnaise, cheese and chillies. Spread into a wide baking dish in a layer not more than 2cm/Â¾in thick.  Bake the mixture until bubbling and golden, about 15 minutes. Serve with tortilla chips for scooping.
ingredients: 1x400g can artichoke hearts, drained, chopped chunky,  250ml/9fl oz mayonnaise,  140g/5oz fresh parmesan, grated,  2 green chillies, seeded and chopped,  plain tortilla chips, for scooping
